ComicInfo.Summary:
FINAL ISSUE
It's the final stand between Masumi and Ryujin, the Yakuza's most powerful soldier. As Masumi fights to defend the last remaining member of the Yamomoto clan, the demons trapped within her blade will seize their opportunity to rebel against her.
Will Masumi survive the wrath of the man they call the Dragon God, or will she suffer the fate of so many before her?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ken Lashley & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Jorge Meguro | 2 | C | Cover C | Jason Cardy | 3 |
